title: ‘I’m Fresh and Ready’: Tadej Pogačar Bubbling Hot Ahead of Giro d’Italia Debut
content:
Bjerg, Majka, and sprinter Molano among Pogačar's teammates for pink jersey quest: Will they be strong enough to support the Slovenian's swashbuckling ambition?

Read the full article at ‘I’m Fresh and Ready’: Tadej Pogačar Bubbling Hot Ahead of Giro d’Italia Debut on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
